programme.title: Johny Johny Yes Appa

programme.title: Maharaja Talkies

programme.title: Aravindhante Athidhikal

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: Four national languages, as many cultural regions, twenty cantons: how did Switzerland manage to build a nation and have such a high GDP? How does the country face climate change? And why does it allow assisted suicide and is about to legalize the sale of cannabis?

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 3
programme.desc: Aged 7, Sakina M'sa left her birthplace of Comoros for Marseille, going from gentle childhood to the reality of inner-city housing. Already as a teenager, she dreamt of fashion. Next, she fled an arranged marriage and moved to Paris, where she protested and launched a totally sustainable and inclusive brand.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 5
programme.desc: In Oberwies, an explanation has finally been found for the landslide. A contract for money and a distorted photo from a mobile phone launched the investigation.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 6
programme.desc: The truth is finally out! Painful and in an unwelcome blaze of publicity, it also brings the hope of a more tranquil future. As hostilities cease between families they finally begin to talk to one another again. Two new half-brothers drink their first beer together...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Fantomas Demasque
programme.desc: Fantomas, such a strange phenomenon! For many, the masked character evoked Andre Hunebelle's films starring Jean Marais, Louis de Funes and Mylene Demongeot. Yet in 1968, Marcel Allain already pointed out that he was the joint creator, with Pierre Souvestre, and that the real Fantomas was dark, harsh, evil, terrifying...

programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Quartier Recherche - EP 8
programme.desc: Myriam and Baptiste are hoping to buy their first house in Montreal. Corey takes them to visit Mile-End. Evelyne prefers to present an apartment in Outremont that hasn't yet been advertised. Because of its rarity, the young couple need to make a quick decision.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1574
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre - EP 23
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Au Fil De L'eau - La Corse, Un Paradis D'eau Vive
programme.desc: Anne-Cecile Monnier sets off to explore the ''Island of Beauty's'' fresh water. A veritable plunge into the crystal clear waters of Corsica's sublime rivers: the Fango, the Solenzara, the Asco and the Restonica and the endemic species that live in these little-known ecosystems, notably the Corsican trout (''salmo trutta macrostigma'').

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 23
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 4
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre - EP 23
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Quartier Recherche - EP 8
programme.desc: Myriam and Baptiste are hoping to buy their first house in Montreal. Corey takes them to visit Mile-End. Evelyne prefers to present an apartment in Outremont that hasn't yet been advertised. Because of its rarity, the young couple need to make a quick decision.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 33
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 47
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 1
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 7
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 40
programme.desc: Alix is helping Chief remove a rock that has mysteriously appeared in the middle of his plot of land, just before the inauguration ceremony for his chalet's first step. But, just as they're about to get rid of it, Chief suddenly becomes rather fond of it.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 4
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires - EP 22
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Voile Bleu
programme.desc: After losing her husband and baby during World War I, Louise decides to devote her life to caring for the children of others as nanny and governess. Many years later, thanks to one of these children, she meets up again with all the children she raised over a Christmas meal.

programme.title: Jesus 2020
programme.desc: Claire is responsible for the PR plan for a small parish. Distinctly short of motivation she allows herself to be caught up in the enthusiasm of young Father Vianney. The result is a campaign that is so successful that Jesus himself seems to have replied, via a Twitter account.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 8
programme.desc: The family is working hard to prepare a surprise for Francois on his birthday. Meanwhile, Jean-Pierre and Rollande are trying out social media. They're surprised just how fast their posts become the buzz of the town and how aggressive some people's comments are.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 9
programme.desc: After two conferences have been cancelled at her hotel in Quebec, Stephanie invites the Morency family for a relaxing weekend. But the Morency family isn't exactly known for their discretion...

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 10
programme.desc: Francois agrees to attend a special men-only evening in order to get to know Stephanie's father better. He also agrees to present a telethon, with his parents acting as switchboard operators.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 11
programme.desc: Judith, dedicated eco-warrior, persuades her family to help her clean up a park. Rollande discovers an old calendar of an author whom she decides to invite to give a talk at the library.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 21
programme.desc: The Villele Museum covers the history of Reunion Island and of slavery in the 18th century. From minuscule to immense, Gregoire Scalabre sculpts and assembles, plunging us into a different dimension. Marine Serre: the 2025 spring-summer collection, veritable message of love. Severine and Christophe, manufacturing Basque knives.

programme.title: L'amour Du Monde
programme.desc: Margaux, 15 years old, is spending her holidays with her father and his new partner. During an internship at a home for children in difficulty, she befriends Juliette, 7 years old, and Joel, a thirty-something fisherman returning from Indonesia. A meeting that will upend her summer...

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf

programme.title: Inde Du Sud, Le Charme Tamoul
programme.desc: South India, long-coveted for its geographical location, still retains the marks of its colonial past. Today Hindu religious fervour is expressed by the spectacular festivities that continue to attract travellers to the region. With its excesses and wealth, South India remains one of Asia's gems.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 799

programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Nouveaux Nomades - EP 13
programme.desc: Laurent Guillaume discovers the Przewalski horses of the Cevennes. Julie Hattu samples Guerande chocolate. Marine Barnieras tries her hand at the dangerous work of the deep-sea divers in the Gulf of Morbihan. eric Perrin heads off to discover the fascinating waves of the Basque coast.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1575
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 2
programme.desc: In Sainte-Foy, St-Denys-du-Plateau church has become Monique-Corriveau library. On Kitcisakik peninsula, the church and the wooden huts are still used by the community. And we discover the profession as tinsmith and roofer.

programme.title: La Folle Traversee De Philippe
programme.desc: A somewhat sedentary father, Philippe has always harboured a secret dream: to swim across Lake Saint-Jean. Determined to succeed, he challenges his 14 year-old daughter Clara. Together they go into training to cross the 32 km separating the two shores, an experience that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 24
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'isabelle Et Ricardo - EP 9
programme.desc: It's party time in the kitchen: Isabelle attacks a delicious vanilla birthday cake and Ricardo shares his tips on how to make the recipe totally fail-proof.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 2
programme.desc: In Sainte-Foy, St-Denys-du-Plateau church has become Monique-Corriveau library. On Kitcisakik peninsula, the church and the wooden huts are still used by the community. And we discover the profession as tinsmith and roofer.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 34
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 48
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 2
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 8
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 41
programme.desc: Alix and Hatter have found a tortoise with a tulip on its back and decide to make a pet of it. They've become very fond of the ''tortulip'' but Alix is concerned to see that the flower on its shell is starting to wilt.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'isabelle Et Ricardo - EP 9
programme.desc: It's party time in the kitchen: Isabelle attacks a delicious vanilla birthday cake and Ricardo shares his tips on how to make the recipe totally fail-proof.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Mise Au Point
programme.desc: The best reports from ''Mise au Point'', the programme that takes a fresh look at national and international news events. Through its exclusive investigations and in-depth reports, ''Mise au Point'' tackles a wide range of topics: politics, economics, social issues, sports, culture and new trends.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 1
programme.desc: A young woman wakes up in hospital after a car accident. Completely amnesiac, she has forgotten everything, including her identity, but the police recognise Marina Masson, a girl kidnapped eleven years ago. Her parents, now separated, hurry to her. Then the body of the suspected kidnapper, Ivan Claes, is found.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 2
programme.desc: Marina secretly meets someone called Mael, with whom she's planning to run away. As Laurent Masson, Marina's father, becomes closer to Helene, his ex-wife, and their children, an identity card in the name of Alexandra Martinez is found in the jacket Marina had lost. Is she an imposter?

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 1
programme.desc: Answers to the most frequent questions concerning meat: its impact on the climate and biodiversity, its close links to gastronomy and food -related habits.

programme.title: #Investigation - EP 10
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Movie - Aanandham
programme.desc: Tirupathi, the eldest son in the family, works hard to raise his three brothers Madhavan, Kannan, and Surya. However, problems arise in the family when Madhavan's wife begins to rebel against him.

programme.title: Movie - Chandramouli
programme.desc: A woman loves both her sons equally, but her biological son hates his adopted brother. One day, they along with the other villagers are forced to evacuate, and the adopted son is separated from them. He grows up with an aim to find them.

programme.title: Movie - Muyalukku Moonu Kaal
programme.desc: This movie stars Suruli Rajan, Sachu, Vijay Babu, Manorama and Venniradai Moorthy, and is directed by V C Guhanathan.

programme.title: Movie - Naanga
programme.desc: Five friends from the 1985 batch of their college reunite after many years to help Devi, one of their own who has woken up from a coma, get back with her lover Babu.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Thee Nagar
programme.desc: A former student union leader in a college helps out his friends and the college at every opportunity he gets. He has his own tea shop in the college premises, but trouble comes in the form of a corrupt cop who crosses swords with him.

programme.title: Movie - Saval
programme.desc: Brothers Shankar and Raja decide to go to the city for better opportunities post their mother's death. However, they get separated while travelling on a goods train.

programme.title: Movie - Thulli Thirintha Kaalam
programme.desc: Khushboo faces several difficulties when she tries to discipline a group of youngsters who are idlers and always cause huge embarrassment to their families.

programme.title: Movie - Military
programme.desc: Madhavan is known as Military due to his strict attitude towards his five sisters. However, when he is forced to get his first sister married to a widowed professor, his other sisters alienate him.

programme.title: Movie - Arasu
programme.desc: Thirunavukkarasu, a gentle soul, takes up the job of handling the temple accounts in Agraharam. Soon, he shows his true identity and seeks revenge against a dangerous criminal who is out of jail.

programme.title: Movie - Kollaikkaran
programme.desc: Kuruvi, a thief, falls in love with Krishnaveni, who rejects him when she learns about his profession. His life turns for the worse when he is falsely accused of stealing a temple's jewel.

programme.title: Movie - Nanbanin Kadhali
programme.desc: Jeeva goes to Goa and falls in love with Sujata. Surya, his new roommate, also begins to woo Sujata. When Sujata responds, Surya rejects her. Surya has a secret that involves Jeeva.

programme.title: Movie - Nanbargal
programme.desc: Priya, an arrogant rich girl quarrels with Vijay in several instances. Later, she falls in love with him when he saves her from a danger. But, her father intends to break their relationship.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Pudhu Nilavu
programme.desc: Madan breaks his friendship with Anand because the latter likes the same girl he does. However, Madan is extremely shocked when he makes a discovery about Anand.

programme.title: Movie - Unnaruge Naan Erunthal
programme.desc: After her father's sudden death, Mahalakshmi is left to clear his debts and face the harsh villagers. A taxi driver helps her cremate her father and pledges his taxi to earn her a temporary reprieve.

programme.title: Movie - Sound Party
programme.desc: A landlord helps a girl become a doctor after she is forced to discontinue her studies due to monetary constraints. Soon, he falls in love with her. But around the same time, the village chief hatches a plan to get his son married to her.

programme.title: Movie - Captain
programme.desc: Kannayiram, a powerful gangster, kills Ramasamy for not giving up his land to him. After hearing this news, Shiva, Ramasamy's brother, flees the military camp to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Movie - Mundhanai Mudichu
programme.desc: Parimalam, a mischievous girl, falls in love with a widower who works as a teacher. She marries him by falsely accusing him of molesting her, but she has to take a drastic step to win his heart.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 32
programme.desc: In a nail-biting climax to the 2011-2012 Premier League season, Manchester City clinched the title with unparalleled drama. Facing Queens Park Rangers on the final matchday, City secured a 3-2 victory with Sergio Aguero's iconic last-minute goal, securing their first league title in 44 years and etching that game into footballing folklore. They have since become the dominant power in English football and we look at how it all began.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs West Ham United (MW30) - EP 292
programme.desc: Wolves lost this exact fixture 2-1 last season, but haven’t lost consecutive home league games against West Ham since a run of three between 1920 and 1922.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 15
programme.desc: Former Premier League stars select their dream teams from the best they played with or against, guiding us through their picks with stories from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton (MW30) (Live) - EP 299
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 24 Premier League home games against Everton (W14 D9), winning five of the last six at Anfield.

programme.title: Southampton vs Crystal Palace (MW30) - EP 298
programme.desc: Ivan Juric has lost all six of his Premier League home games as Southampton boss, one of only three managers to lose each of their first 6+ home matches in the competition, along with Mick McCarthy and Vincent Kompany, who both lost their first seven.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton (MW30) - EP 299
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 24 Premier League home games against Everton (W14 D9), winning five of the last six at Anfield.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Ipswich Town (MW30) - EP 294
programme.desc: Ipswich have only won one of their 16 away league games against Bournemouth (D7 L8), beating them 3-2 in September 1953. This is their first visit since a 2-2 draw in the Championship in November 2014.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Brentford (MW30) - EP 297
programme.desc: Excluding own goals, Brentford have scored from their first shot of a match nine times in the Premier League this season, the most of any side, while Newcastle have conceded the first shot they have faced nine times, also a league-high figure.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Aston Villa (MW30) - EP 295
programme.desc: Brighton have won each of their last three Premier League games at the Amex Stadium, and are looking to win four home matches in a row for the very first time in the top-flight.

programme.title: FS MMA Tara LaRosa vs. Amanda Buckner
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Amanda Buckner and Tara LaRosa are two of the world's best female fighters. Both are highly trained in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, Judo and Muay Thai, watch them face off in Costa Rica.

programme.title: WCCB Jaron Ennis vs. Roiman Villa
programme.desc: From Atlantic City, undefeated rising star Jaron 'Boots' Ennis will defend his Interim IBF Welterweight World Championship against the biggest puncher he has faced so far in his career, Roiman Villa. Ennis is a fixture on many lists of the future superstars of the sport, expected to be one of boxing's best fighters. He will need to get passed Villa, who has 24 knockouts in his 27 professional fights. It's Ennis vs. Villa, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights James Kirkland vs. Alfredo Angulo
programme.desc: This episode features James Kirkland as he faces Alfredo Angulo in an explosive, hard-hitting fight, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Shohozan, Yutakayama, Endo and Okinoumi

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 9: Netanya, Israel - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Krav Maga with Masters Ran Nakash and Avivit Oftek Cohen.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Yesenia Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, World Boxing Council (WBC) No. 1 contender Kim Clavel (15-0, 3 KOs) faces WBC Flyweight World Champion Yesenia Gomez (19-5-3, 6 KOs), who will defend her world title belt for the fifth time, at the Cabaret of Montreal Casino in Canada.

programme.title: Return to the Ring Rocky Gannon vs. Dominick Carter
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. In this original documentary series, we sit with the participants from some of boxing's most interesting bouts, including the fighters, trainers, officials and promoters that contributed to each event.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Canelo Alvarez vs. Kermit Cintron
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Canelo Alvarez taking on Kermit Cintron in a bout that helped elevate Alvarez into the light middleweight title picture and take another step towards becoming one of the biggest names in boxing. Also on the card, action from a classic battle between Joel Casamayor and Michael Katsidis for the WBO Lightweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Chiyotairyu, Ryuden, Asanoyama and Takarafuji.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: This episode features Shane Mosley looking for a win against Ricardo Mayorga, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features two-time UFC champion and Hall of Famer Randy "The Natural" Couture and his buddies firing up their motorcycles for a good cause, plus an interview with one of MMA's biggest stars, "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey. We've got another installment of the gun store challenge this time with Thiago Alves, plus we go behind the scenes for a photo shoot with ring girl Arianny Celeste, exclusively on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Ziko Makengele vs. Mark Hulme
programme.desc: In this episode Mark Hulme takes on Ziko 'The Gorilla' Makengele for the World Welterweight Championship.

This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Chiyotairyu, Ryuden, Asanoyama and Takarafuji.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: This episode features Shane Mosley looking for a win against Ricardo Mayorga, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features two-time UFC champion and Hall of Famer Randy "The Natural" Couture and his buddies firing up their motorcycles for a good cause, plus an interview with one of MMA's biggest stars, "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey. We've got another installment of the gun store challenge this time with Thiago Alves, plus we go behind the scenes for a photo shoot with ring girl Arianny Celeste, exclusively on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Yesenia Gomez

programme.title: Return to the Ring Rocky Gannon vs. Dominick Carter
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s 'The Exchange' is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s 'The Exchange' is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, 'Power Lunch' delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, 'Power Lunch' delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, 'Closing Bell' guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, 'Closing Bell' guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. 'Closing Bell: Overtime' takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. 'Closing Bell: Overtime' takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: Fast Money' is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, 'Fast Money' breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: Fast Money' is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, 'Fast Money' breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Buddy Talk

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Founder Stories
programme.desc: Success stories of founders of start-up businesses. Stories from what sparked the idea, the obstacles they went through, to the results that benefit many people.

programme.title: Meet The Creators S3
programme.desc: Meet the Creators will take you to see the journey of local works and businesses in Indonesia.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Catch that Spy - EP 2
programme.desc: The host leads the guests to challenge the game. The game is fun and full of wits. The good guys and spies fight for the prize money, and the suspenseful atmosphere brings the audience a new and different experience!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1427
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 480
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 239
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - Reserve Your Dreams - EP 1672
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: Miss Chill Chill - EP 35
programme.desc: Leave all the big and small matters in life to Miss Chill Chill. Let you understand most things in life with the coolest mood!

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1002
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Al Cappuccino - EP 28
programme.desc: Struggling actor Cheung Sai Lun gets invited to act as the son of a mafia boss and somehow gets forced into becoming a police informant. While working with undercover Ko Ban, he experiences a series of extraordinary comedic events.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 13
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2525
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Song of Youth - EP 43
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun is the daughter of a once-powerful government official. After being accused of corruption, her father and the rest of the family fall from grace. To make ends meet, she joins a troupe of travelling performers, but intends to avenge those who wronged her family.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 36
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 2
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 15
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1920
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 22
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 30
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 32
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1922
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 32
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 33
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 8
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 2
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Jane’s husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lan’s hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lam’s husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wan’s younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 4
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 24
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other…_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 5
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry.
